ov sling tmux creation fails with 'can't find pane' when model in config.yaml does not exist in pi available model list
resolution: Create tmux session manually and start pi with available model. Session shows zombie in ov inspect but works correctly.

ov sling fails with 'branch already exists' if prior zombie session used same agent name + task-id. ov nudge also fails because watchdog reverts state to zombie instantly.
resolution: Create tmux session manually, start pi with OVERSTORY_AGENT_NAME set, send task via tmux send-keys. Self-verify quality gates directly as lead rather than waiting for builder mail.

name: lead-simple-task-manual-tmux
description: lead-async-client: simple 1-file factory async conversion — spawned single builder, no scout/reviewer needed. Manually created tmux session (ov sling tmux failure due to invalid model gpt-5.3-codex in config.yaml). Sent full spec in dispatch mail body. Builder completed in ~30s. Self-verified diff + typecheck.

content: Worktree edits require absolute path starting with WORKTREE_PATH/ for path boundary validation in overstory-guard.ts extension — relative paths fail despite being within git root
